txt.en: The water here is dark, cool, and clear
This is a good place to examine the water's quality
This is not a good place to test the water....
The dwarf Búi has stopped in the Hall of Flowing Water to record and map the reservoirs of Zelem-melek.
This is a good place to examine the water's quality
This is a good place to examine the water's quality
To your left, an Orc camp stretches as far as the eye can see. It is the greatest Orc establishment you have seen yet in Zelem-melek....

'Well, hello there! Are you travelling through these parts as well? I am happy to be exploring, and happier that I have found something worth noting on my map of Zelem-melek!

'Clean flowing water will be invaluable to our expedition, for hauling it in has been a sore trial with the Sirannon all blocked up.

'Will you search around for flows or reservoirs of clean water?'
Water can be tested at any of the waterfalls in the Hall of Flowing Water.\n\nYou should use the phial to collect samples of water in Zelem-melek.

'A massive Orc camp to the south, you say? Perhaps this is where the fiends are pouring from. I believe you have discovered the source of the expedition's bane in the Twenty-first Hall, friend [placeholder].'
Water can be tested in the reservoirs in passages adjacent to the Hall of Flowing Water.\n\nYou should use the phial to collect samples of water in Zelem-melek.
Other sources of water may be near the Hall of Flowing Water.\n\nYou should search near the Hall of Flowing Water for more water sources to sample.
Búi is in the Hall of Flowing Water in central Zelem-melek.\n\nYou should return to Búi with your findings.
Examine the purity of the water in the Hall of Flowing Water
The water is clean and cold ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Search near the Hall of Flowing Water for more water sources
Return to Búi with your findings
